locations.name: Tokyo
locations.description: The vibrant capital city, offering a blend of futuristic skyscrapers, historic neighborhoods like Yanaka, trendy districts like Shibuya and Shinjuku, and serene gardens.

locations.name: Kyoto
locations.description: The cultural heart of Japan, renowned for its temples (Kinkaku-ji), shrines (Fushimi Inari), bamboo groves (Arashiyama), and the traditional Gion district.

locations.name: Hakone
locations.description: A mountain resort town within a national park, famous for its natural hot springs (onsen), stunning views of Mt. Fuji (weather permitting), Lake Ashi, and art museums.
